CustomField.formula:
IF(Total_Rebates__c >= 0,
"$" & IF( Total_Rebates__c >= 1000000, TEXT(FLOOR(Total_Rebates__c / 1000000)) & ",", "") & IF( Total_Rebates__c >= 1000, RIGHT(TEXT(FLOOR(Total_Rebates__c / 1000)), 3) & ",", "") & RIGHT(TEXT(FLOOR(Total_Rebates__c )), 3) & "." & IF( MOD(Total_Rebates__c , 1) * 100 < 10, "0" & TEXT(ROUND(MOD(Total_Rebates__c , 1), 2) * 100), TEXT(MIN(ROUND(MOD(Total_Rebates__c , 1), 2) * 100, 99)) ),
"$" & IF( Total_Rebates__c < -1000, RIGHT(TEXT(FLOOR(Total_Rebates__c / 1000)), 4) & "," & RIGHT(TEXT(FLOOR(Total_Rebates__c )), 3) & "." & IF( ABS(MOD(Total_Rebates__c , 1) * 100) < 10, "0" & TEXT(ABS(ROUND(MOD(Total_Rebates__c , 1), 2) * 100)), TEXT(ABS(MIN(ROUND(MOD(Total_Rebates__c , 1), 2) * 100, 99))) ),
IF( Total_Rebates__c < 0, RIGHT(TEXT(FLOOR(Total_Rebates__c )), 4) & "." & IF( ABS(MOD(Total_Rebates__c , 1) * 100) < 10, "0" & TEXT(ABS(ROUND(MOD(Total_Rebates__c , 1), 2) * 100)), TEXT(ABS(MIN(ROUND(MOD(Total_Rebates__c , 1), 2) * 100, 99))) ), "0")) )

CustomField.label: Rebates
